name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Kevin B. WILSON, Appellant
docket_number: Appeal No. 44 Eastern District Appeal Docket 1993

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

MOÑTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Kevin B. WILSON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MOÑTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Patrick J. Connors, Media, for K. Wilson.
William H. Ryan, Jr., Dennis C. McAndrews, Media, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
642 A.2d 1086
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Kevin B. WILSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 24, 1994.
Decided May 23, 1994.
Patrick J. Connors, Media, for K. Wilson.
William H. Ryan, Jr., Dennis C. McAndrews, Media, for Com.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
